titles.title: Steel Tariffs bill

Providing for the disposition of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 84) disapproving the action taken by the President under section 203 of the Trade Act of 1974 transmitted to the Congress on March 5, 2002.

action.text: Upon the adoption of this resolution, H.J. Res. 84 is laid on the table.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-447, by Mr. Reynolds.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 154.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 414.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 355 - 62 (Roll no. 129).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 386 - 30, 1 Present (Roll no. 130).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/7/2002--Reported to House without amendment. Sets forth the rule laying on the table H.J.Res. 84 (disapproving the action taken by the President on March 5, 2002, to impose specified tariffs on steel imports).
